description:
Raccoon says that everyone has two people in the world who look just like them. Bonobono has wanted to meet his twin. They search high and low and ask Wolverine`s dad, but still can`t find him. Badger says he`s seen Bonobono`s twin, so they follow him...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Want to Meet My Twin
Sokkuri na Ko ni Atte Mitai
そっくりな子に会ってみたい
